participant_1.background:
I want to show off my new earrings to my friends.
I'm proud of who I am, and I'm not going to let my vision impairment stop me from living my life to the fullest.
my ultimate dream , however , is to be a writer.
i drive a ford taurus.
i like to sing broadway show tunes.

participant_2.background:
I would like to have lunch with a doctor who can help me recover from my knee surgery.
I currently rent my home.
i volunteer at the red cross on the weekends.
i like to place blame on other people even when i know it is my fault.
i like the band queens of the stone age.

content.text: Hello! My name is [name], nice to meet you!
Hi [name], I'm [name], nice to meet you too!
What are you up to today?
I'm just getting ready to go to work.
What kind of work do you do?
Oh, that's cool! I'm a writer.
That's awesome! I've always wanted to write, but I'm too shy.
You shouldn't be! Writing is a great way to express yourself.
I know, I know. I'll start writing more often.
I'm glad to hear that! What kind of music do you like?
I like a lot of different kinds of music, but my favorite band is Queens of the Stone Age.
Oh, I love them too! They're one of my favorite bands.
Really? That's awesome! We should go to a concert together sometime.
That would be fun! I'd love to go to a concert with you.
Great! We'll have to make plans soon.
